channel.title: Trauma on Joshua Graves
channel.description: Recent content in Trauma on Joshua Graves

item.title: CPTSD, From Surviving to Thriving
item.description: Focuses on inner child work, reparenting, and facing your shadow as ways to recover from CPTSD. By Pete Walker.

item.title: What It Takes to Heal
item.description: On how a mix of somatics and therapeutic practices can help heal from personal and generational trauma. By Prentis Hemphill.
